intervention_catalogue.name: Becoming New Me Plus: intimate partner violence offence
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Becoming New Me Plus (BNM+) uses cognitive behavioural therapy. It is for men who are at high or very high risk of reoffending. This strand is for men convicted of an intimate partner violence offence.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Becoming New Me Plus (BNM+) uses cognitive behavioural therapy. It is for men who are at high or very high risk of reoffending. This strand is for men convicted of an intimate partner violence offence.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail:
Group and one-to-one, in person.

85 group sessions + 7 individual sessions.


Alternatively, sessions can be exclusively one-to-one with a minimum of 20 sessions (depending on the needs of the individual).

risk_consideration.sara_partner_score_guide: High SARA (Spousal Assault Risk Assessment) against partners
